metadata.how_to_trigger: Start Act 2 epilogue with Florrick being present and speak with the Flaming Fist.Debug Book -> Set quest flags -> Act 2 -> SCE - Epilogue -> Set up good path -> End debrief dialog -> Speak with S_SCE_StandingFlamingFist_002

0.speaker: Flaming Fist
0.text: Let's regroup and march. I don't know if I can wait around much longer.

1.speaker: Flaming Fist
1.text: My mum lives in the Lower City. If those freaks hurt her, I'll turn them inside out.
